pkgmetadata.longdescription: Gzip Reader===========Transparently decompress gzipped file stream on the fly.Installation-------------:: pip install gzip-readerUsage-----.. code:: python from gzip_reader import GzipReader fd = GzipReader(urlopen('http://example.com/some_file.gz')) # or fd = GzipReader(socket_conn.makefile('rb')) for line in fd: print line
